Name: Statue of the Hero Postcard
Description: Deemed unjust by the Bapharian Creed, the Asterleeds Independence War inspired the people to craft solemn tree carvings—silent tributes to the heroes who secured independence and peace...
Description$english: Deemed unjust by the Bapharian Creed, the Asterleeds Independence War inspired the people to craft solemn tree carvings—silent tributes to the heroes who secured independence and peace...
Description2$english: Obtaining this item will unlock the corresponding postcard, which can be viewed in the "Archive."
